scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_package_name ($npm_package_version) ## $(date) ## " && git push origin master
scripts.re-generate: npm run compile-contracts && npm run move-artifacts
scripts.pre-build: rm -rf ./prod && tsc && cd ./webui && npm run build
scripts.self-build: npm run pre-build && npm run move-folders
scripts.deploy:local-move::self-build: npm run deploy:local-move && npm run self-build
scripts.deploy:sepolia-move::self-build: npm run deploy:sepolia-move && npm run self-build
scripts.deploy-app: npm run self-build && npm run git && git push heroku master
scripts.deploy:local: npm run re-generate && rm -rf ./ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/AuctionFactory.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npm run re-generate && rm -rf ./ignition/deployments && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/AuctionFactory.ts --network sepolia
scripts.compile-contracts: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile
